attributes.action: `SETUP` A DEPT TO OVERSEE THE `WASTE` OF THE BBC FUNDS
attributes.additional_details:
We want to see the `government` setup a dept to STOP the BBC wasting large amounts of money on PAYOUTS to its top people when leaving, many struggle to pay the licence fees these days with the BBC wasting around 25 million pounds in hand outs, they must be held to account on this as at this time they appear to be a law onto them selves only, they are quick enough to increase the licence fees to pay these massive pay outs, lets put the pressure on them to conform to the real world.

Lets get this enforced as they appear not to be able to do this them selves but feather the nest of some employees, VERY WRONG.

rejection.details: A matter for the BBC Trust.  The Government is in regular contact with them, and the Director-General, however.
